channel.title: Special attack help
channel.description: Hey, so I'm using Deception source with PI base and I'm working on adding Kosai's sword to my server. I have it fully added with anims for special attack however when i used the attack it wont drain the special bar at all. I've honestly tried everything and I cant seem to get it to work. Would someone please help?

item.title: Special attack help
item.dc:creator: @chri55w chri55w
item.description:
@chri55w wrote:

check the action button is set up properly, sometimes the action button id is different for different items

Read full topic

item.title: Special attack help
item.dc:creator: @bedhead_321 bedhead 321
item.description:
@bedhead_321 wrote:

Hey, so I’m using Deception source with PI base and I’m working on adding Kosai’s sword to my server. I have it fully added with anims for special attack however when i used the attack it wont drain the special bar at all. I’ve honestly tried everything and I cant seem to get it to work.
